txt.en: You explain that River Hobbits value their secrecy, and in some cases have brokered deals with the Great Eagles of the Misty Mountains to keep their cherished hobbit-holes safe from prying eyes. No River Hobbit would willingly jeopardize the safety of their home, but they have been known to wander far and wide on occasion, seeking adventure and excitement in distant lands.
Let me tell you about River Hobbits.
